FFlagFCSkeletonIgnoreUnusedPartsCheckFac.purpose: Enhances performance and responsiveness of character animations.

FFlagAXOutlineSubcategoryPill.mechanism: Introduces a visual element to categorize items in the marketplace.

FFlagAXMarketplaceCategoryPillTooltip.mechanism: Adds tooltips to category pills in the marketplace for additional information.

FFlagPurchasePromptPriceShouldUseProduct.mechanism: Ensures that the purchase prompt displays the correct product pricing.
FFlagPurchasePromptPriceShouldUseProduct.purpose: Eliminates confusion by showing accurate prices when buying items.

FFlagStudioFixStandalonePluginUnloadingA.mechanism: Improves the way plugins are unloaded in the studio, making it more efficient.
FFlagStudioFixStandalonePluginUnloadingA.purpose: Reduces delays and crashes when using plugins, enhancing the overall development experience.

FFlagColorPickerUseGridLayout.mechanism: Changes the layout of the color picker to a grid format for better organization.
FFlagColorPickerUseGridLayout.purpose: Makes it easier for users to find and select colors quickly.

FFlagAppChatFixPaddingWhenScaling.mechanism: Adjusts the padding in the chat interface when the app is resized.
FFlagAppChatFixPaddingWhenScaling.purpose: Ensures the chat looks good and is usable on different screen sizes.

FFlagEnableProfilePlatformDualCta_v5_IXP.mechanism: Introduces a dual call-to-action button setup on user profiles.
FFlagEnableProfilePlatformDualCta_v5_IXP.purpose: Provides players with more options to interact with profiles, enhancing user engagement.

FFlagEnableAppNavGamepadRemoval.mechanism: Removes the gamepad navigation option from the app's interface.
FFlagEnableAppNavGamepadRemoval.purpose: Streamlines navigation for players who use touch or mouse controls, improving usability.

FFlagLuaAppShowAgeRatingWithPlayButtonOn.mechanism: Displays age rating and play button on hover over game tiles, hiding additional metadata.
FFlagLuaAppShowAgeRatingWithPlayButtonOn.purpose: Helps players quickly see if a game is appropriate for their age before playing.

FFlagFFlagIconHostSetZIndexToDefault.mechanism: Adjusts the layering order of icons to a default setting.

FFlagMicroprofilerBigButtons_Staged.mechanism: Introduces larger buttons in the microprofiler tool for easier interaction.
FFlagMicroprofilerBigButtons_Staged.purpose: Makes it simpler for developers to analyze performance data without straining to click small buttons.

FFlagReconnectToSameServer_Staged.mechanism: Allows players to reconnect to the same game server after disconnection.
FFlagReconnectToSameServer_Staged.purpose: Provides a smoother experience by letting players return to their previous game session without losing progress.

FFlagEnableSocialSelfProfileViewExposure.mechanism: Tracks when players view their own profiles in social features.
FFlagEnableSocialSelfProfileViewExposure.purpose: Helps improve social features by understanding how players interact with their profiles.

DFIntDataStoreOrderedSetFixedRequestLimi.mechanism: Limits the number of requests for data storage based on the place being accessed.
DFIntDataStoreOrderedSetFixedRequestLimi.purpose: Improves performance by ensuring data requests are managed efficiently for different game places.

FFlagVideoEncoderScopedOutputBuffer.mechanism: Enhances video encoding by using a more efficient output buffer.
FFlagVideoEncoderScopedOutputBuffer.purpose: Provides players with higher quality video streaming and recording experiences.

FFlagShowSocialContextToastToAll.mechanism: Displays social notifications to all players in a game.
FFlagShowSocialContextToastToAll.purpose: Keeps players informed about social interactions, enhancing community engagement.

FFlagAXEnableItemDetailsTryOnPage2.mechanism: Allows players to try on items directly from the second page of the catalog.
FFlagAXEnableItemDetailsTryOnPage2.purpose: Makes it easier for players to visualize how items look before purchasing.

FFlagUIBloxTruncateExperienceTileMetadat.mechanism: Shortens the text displayed in the footer of experience tiles.

FFlagAddTopBarScrim.purpose: Enhances user experience by allowing players to access new tools and options easily.

FStringLuaOTATag.mechanism: Tags specific Lua scripts for over-the-air updates.

FFlagAXQuickButtonsFrameShouldAlwaysExis.mechanism: Ensures the quick buttons frame is always present in the user interface.

FFlagAXExternalItemDetailsOverlay.mechanism: Introduces an overlay for displaying details of external items.

DFFlagWriteFlagCacheAfterFlagFetch.purpose: Ensures players experience faster loading times and smoother gameplay.

FFlagEnableFAECancellationAnalytics.purpose: Provides developers with data to improve player experience by understanding cancellation reasons.

FFlagEnableConfirmButtonIconOnPlaystatio.mechanism: Displays a confirmation button icon specifically for PlayStation controllers.

FFlagSTM6819Enabled_Staged.purpose: Improves game performance and stability during updates.

FFlagAXCategoryPillPadding.mechanism: Adjusts the spacing around category buttons in the UI.
FFlagAXCategoryPillPadding.purpose: Enhances the visual layout for a better user experience.

DFFlagVideoSandboxPreviewVideos_Staged.mechanism: Allows previewing videos in a controlled environment before full release.
